44-1403.Applicability of act; election; notice.

The Nebraska Right to Shop Act shall apply to any insurance carrier that elects to be subject to the act. An insurance carrier making such election shall file a notice of the election with the department.

SourceLaws 2018, LB1119, ยง 13.
